trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia dane dla <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> zdarzenie <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: The CustomizeLegendEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event.
trans-unit.target: Klasa CustomizeLegendEventArgs jest używana w <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: There are only two properties in this class.
trans-unit.target: Istnieją tylko dwa właściwości tej klasy.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A> property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>Właściwości umożliwia usunięcia lub zmodyfikowania domyślnych i niestandardowe elementy legendy i dodać niestandardowe elementy legendy.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to change the order of legend items.
trans-unit.target: Tej właściwości można również zmienić kolejność elementów legendy.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A> property is used to identify the legend that raised this event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>Właściwość jest używana do identyfikowania legendy, która wywołała to zdarzenie.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs.LegendName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> klasy z określonym <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> and legend name.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomizeLegendEventArgs"> </xref> klasy z określonym <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"> </xref> i nazwę legendy.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The legend name.
trans-unit.target: Nazwa legendy.

trans-unit.source: Used to remove, modify or change the order of both custom and default legend items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Służy do usuwania, zmodyfikować lub zmienić kolejność zarówno niestandardowe i domyślne elementy legendy w <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Można również dodać niestandardowe elementy legendy.

trans-unit.source: The LegendItems property allows you to delete or modify both default and custom legend items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, and to add custom legend items.
trans-unit.target: Właściwość LegendItems służy do usuwania lub modyfikowania domyślnych i niestandardowe elementy legendy w <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>zdarzenia i dodać niestandardowe elementy legendy.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend>

trans-unit.source: The order of legend items can also be changed.
trans-unit.target: Można także zmienić kolejność elementów legendy.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> and [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) properties can be used to determine the data element that is associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>i [LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) właściwości może służyć do określenia element danych skojarzony z elementem legendy domyślnego.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties will return zero-length strings for custom legend items, because custom items are not associated with chart data.
trans-unit.target: Te właściwości zwróci o zerowej długości ciągów dla niestandardowe elementy legendy, ponieważ elementy niestandardowe nie są skojarzone z danych wykresu.

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> the event was raised for, which enables you to customize an individual [Legend](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość umożliwia określenie, które <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>wywołano zdarzenie, co umożliwia dostosowanie osoby [legendy](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object, which can be used to determine which legend was the sender of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera nazwę <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> obiektu, który może służyć do określenia legendy, które zostało nadawcy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend"> </xref> zdarzeń.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> wartość, która reprezentuje nazwę skojarzonego <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"> </xref> obiektu.
